org.writeforward.logger.writers

Interface Formatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMessageFormatter, MustacheFormatter

    public interface Formatter
    Formats a message just the way you want it.
    Author:
    Matt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String format(Message m)
      Takes a message to be logged and returns a string representing the message.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        java.lang.String format(Message m)
        Takes a message to be logged and returns a string representing the message.
        Parameters:
        m - The completed message object.
        Returns:
        What will be written to the output file or stream unless using a SLF4J logger (like log4j) in which case this will use SLF4J methods for formatting.
